title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal secrets, but is tasked with planting an idea instead.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Two girls discover forest spirits in rural Japan while dealing with their mother's illness.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns the reality he lives in is a simulated reality controlled by intelligent machines.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos's snap and restore balance to the universe.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence drives the father into violence.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and form a connection that transcends time and space.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: Three gunslingers compete to find a fortune in buried Confederate gold.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre's peaceful swamp life is disrupted, leading him on a quest to rescue a princess.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: A Silent Voice
description: A former bully tries to make amends with a deaf girl he once tormented in elementary school.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical test against the anarchic Joker.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a comically absurd quest for the Holy Grail.

title: Her
description: A lonely man develops a relationship with an advanced operating system designed to meet his needs.

title: The Exorcist
description: A mother seeks the help of priests to save her daughter from demonic possession.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
description: Teen pilots must defend Earth from existential threats as reality and identity unravel.

title: Coco
description: A young boy journeys to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family's musical legacy.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a simple man with a low IQ who inadvertently influences major historical events across decades.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit sets out on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.

title: Fight Club
description: An office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of a German businessman who saved over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social backgrounds fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Social Network
description: The dramatic rise of Facebook and the legal battles that followed its explosive success.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Toy Story
description: A group of toys comes to life when humans aren't around, navigating jealousy and friendship.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and a lobby boy are swept into a murder mystery involving a priceless painting and a family feud in a fictional European country.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic desert wasteland, a drifter joins forces with a rebel to free a tyrant’s enslaved wives and find redemption.

title: The Truman Show
description: A man discovers his entire life is a reality TV show and struggles to escape the constructed world around him.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
description: In Fascist Spain, a young girl discovers a mythical labyrinth and is tasked with completing dangerous trials to prove she is a lost princess.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force race to uncover each other’s identity in a deadly game of deception.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles, facing tough choices along the way.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A lone juror attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his fellow jurors to reconsider the evidence.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where he’s pushed beyond his limits by an abusive instructor.

title: The Green Mile
description: A death row prison guard develops a profound connection with a gentle giant inmate who possesses mysterious healing powers.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: A laid-back slacker is mistaken for a millionaire with the same name and gets pulled into a bizarre kidnapping plot.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean and must ensure his parents fall in love to return to the future.

title: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of a mob associate as he navigates the violent and glamorous life of organized crime in New York City.

title: The Princess Bride
description: A young woman’s true love sets out on a quest to rescue her from an evil prince, encountering outlaws, giants, and magic along the way.

title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians compete to create the ultimate illusion, pushing each other to dangerous and obsessive extremes.

title: WALL·E
description: A small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that decides the fate of humanity.

title: The Revenant
description: After being left for dead, a frontiersman fights for survival and vengeance in the frozen wilderness of 1820s America.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: An uneducated teenager from Mumbai surprises everyone by advancing on a game show, revealing his life story in the process.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A child psychologist works with a boy who claims to see dead people, uncovering a chilling truth along the way.

title: The Shape of Water
description: A mute cleaning woman at a secret government lab forms a bond with a captured amphibious creature during the Cold War.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave teams up with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors and uncover their mysterious purpose on Earth.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The true story of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who rose to immense wealth through fraud and excess before facing a dramatic downfall.

title: The Iron Giant
description: A boy befriends a massive robot from space, but their friendship is threatened when the government views it as a danger.

title: Gone Girl
description: A man becomes the prime suspect in the disappearance of his wife, revealing dark secrets beneath their seemingly perfect marriage.

title: Inside Out
description: The emotions inside a young girl's mind struggle to help her navigate a life-changing move across the country.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: Four individuals descend into addiction and delusion as their dreams of happiness unravel into tragedy.

title: Amélie
description: A whimsical Parisian woman decides to improve the lives of those around her while grappling with her own isolation.

title: The Hunt
description: A kindergarten teacher’s life spirals when a false accusation of abuse spreads through his small Danish town.

title: Black Swan
description: A ballet dancer’s obsession with perfection drives her into a psychological breakdown as she prepares for the role of the Swan Queen.

title: Oldboy
description: After being imprisoned for 15 years without explanation, a man is released and given five days to find his captor.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish-Jewish pianist struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during World War II.

title: Logan
description: An aging Wolverine and ailing Professor X protect a young mutant while evading deadly forces in a near-future dystopia.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: A voyage to Jupiter becomes a battle between man and machine after a sentient AI begins to malfunction.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious world of spirits and must find the courage to save her parents and return home.

title: Cinema Paradiso
description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood love for cinema and the projectionist who inspired him in post-war Italy.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter finds a suitcase of cash at a crime scene, setting off a deadly pursuit by a relentless hitman.

title: The Lives of Others
description: In East Berlin, a Stasi agent becomes emotionally involved while spying on a playwright and his lover.

title: The Intouchables
description: A wealthy quadriplegic hires a young man from the projects as his caregiver, forming an unlikely and life-changing friendship.

title: Gran Torino
description: A grizzled Korean War veteran confronts his prejudices when he forms a bond with a young Hmong neighbor.

title: The Florida Project
description: A precocious six-year-old lives with her young mother in a budget motel near Disney World, finding adventure amidst poverty.

title: Catch Me If You Can
description: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr., a con artist who impersonated a pilot, doctor, and lawyer—all before his 19th birthday.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt the man he thinks killed his wife.

title: Lady Bird
description: A strong-willed teenager navigates a complicated relationship with her mother while coming of age in Sacramento.

title: The Handmaiden
description: In 1930s Korea, a con man and a pickpocket scheme to defraud a wealthy heiress, only to be drawn into unexpected entanglements.

title: Prisoners
description: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands after his daughter and her friend go missing and the police stall.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A man undergoes a procedure to erase memories of a failed relationship, only to rediscover its importance during the process.

title: The Farewell
description: A Chinese-American woman returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to her terminally ill grandmother.

title: Room
description: Held captive for years, a woman and her young son escape and must adjust to the outside world together.

title: The Banshees of Inisherin
description: On a remote Irish island, a lifelong friendship ends abruptly, triggering emotional and violent consequences.

title: Sound of Metal
description: A heavy-metal drummer’s life is turned upside down when he begins to lose his hearing and must learn to navigate silence.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner unearths a secret that could collapse society, leading him to search for a long-missing predecessor.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers descend into madness as they confront isolation, storms, and supernatural forces on a remote island.

title: The Father
description: An aging man with dementia struggles to distinguish reality as his daughter tries to care for him with patience and love.

title: Drive
description: A stunt driver moonlighting as a getaway driver becomes entangled in a heist gone wrong that threatens everyone he cares about.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Nazi Germany finds his world turned upside down when he discovers his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
description: A retired legal counselor revisits a decades-old murder case that still haunts him, seeking closure and truth.

title: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
description: A quirky family must band together to save the world when a robot uprising interrupts their cross-country road trip.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: Seven anti-Vietnam War protesters face federal charges in a political trial that captured the nation’s attention in 1969.

title: Minari
description: A Korean-American family moves to rural Arkansas in search of the American dream, facing challenges and growth along the way.

title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
description: In 18th-century France, an artist falls in love with the woman she’s been commissioned to secretly paint.
